name: GetShieldInformationBarriers
description:
Retrieve shield information barriers for the enterprise.

This tool fetches a list of shield information barrier objects associated with the enterprise according to the JWT.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: Defines the starting point for paginated results using marker-based pagination.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of shield information barrier objects to return per page. This controls the pagination size.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
